FuncDef: This command configures the time for which the forwarding state applicable during redirect phase is held in the system, after the user has been authenticated on the portal. This allows the HTTP response from the portal to be forwarded back on the existing connection.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies how long the system holds on to re-direct forwarding resources of a subscriber, after it has left the re-direct portal. Values-1 to 60.
